product_name: CatEye CC-VL820 Velo 9 Wired Bike Computer
long_description: Get all the basics and a great value with the CatEye CC-VL820 Velo 9 wired bike computer. Large display is easy to read; auto start/stop functionality helps extend battery life. In addition to current, max and avg. speed, computer displays trip and total distance, pace and estimated calorie consumption. Also offers carbon offset tracking. Single button on the CatEye CC-VL820 Velo 9 wired bike computer makes it simple to operate and flip through screens.
short_description: Get all the basics and a great value with the CatEye CC-VL820 Velo 9 wired bike computer.
